mapper.select: SELECT `blogInfo`.blogContent blogContent, `blogInfo`.createTime createTime, `blogInfo`.collectNum collectNum, `blogInfo`.likesNum likesNum, `blogInfo`.commentNum commentNum, `blogInfo`.forwardNum forwardNum, `User`.username username, `User`.avatar avatar FROM blogInfo, `User` WHERE `blogInfo`.blogId = #{blogId} AND `blogInfo`.userId = `User`.userId;
